text: We may ask third parties with whom you communicate through the Service to provide you with information We may ask third parties with whom you communicate through the Service to provide you with information.

If the user requests disclosure of his or her personal information in accordance with the provisions of the Personal Information Protection Law, the Company shall disclose the information to the user without delay after confirming that the request is made by the user himself or herself (if the personal information does not exist, the Company shall notify the user to that effect).
We may collect information about your access to the Service and how you use it.
We will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Notice unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
